name: Cours-je ?
description:
Description

Cours-je ? is a short action game where a hippie has to collect squashes and some weird grass from his super speed field in order to evade poverty.

How to play

Move and collect your crops and go sell them to the baskets on the map. You will be able to buy some new crops by interacting with your letterbox.

Collaborators
  • Céline Wang : Game Designer, UI Designer, Level Designer
  • Alan Siviniant : Game Designer, Sound Designer, FX Programmer
  • Robin Lefebvre : Programmer, Game Designer
  • Hugues Le Maguer : Graphic Designer, Game Designer

Participation to the Global Game Jam 2023 (2 weeks later)
Theme : Roots
